name: PLEASE BE AWARE OF YOUR SURROUNDINGS
name_original: PLEASE BE AWARE OF YOUR SURROUNDINGS
description:
My entry to the Epic Jam 2019, and my first try making something in Unreal!

WASD to move. Space to jump.

PLEASE BE AWARE OF YOUR SURROUNDINGS is a non-VR game about VR. This is my first Unreal project, so it's probably horribly unoptimized. Sorry! If you're able to download and play, I hope you enjoy it!

Thank you to the incredible creators of the following content packs:

Ancient Treasures (Dekogon Studios)
Brushify - Environment Shaders Pack (Joe Garth)
HQ Residential House (NOT Lonely)
Landscape Backgrounds (Gokhan Karadayi)
Open World Demo Collection (Epic Games)
Procedural Nature Pack Vol.1 (Pure Polygons)
Soul: Cave (Epic Games)
Starter Content (Epic Games)
Water Planes (Epic Games)

Sound FX from sonniss.com

Music by me

Thank you for playing!
